mapper.select: SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT AP.APPROVAL_ID, AP.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, AP.TOTAL_COST, AP.PAYMENT_POINT, AP.PAYMENT_COST, AP.PAYMENT_KIND, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'PAYMENT_KIND2' AND DD_KEY = AP.PAYMENT_KIND) PAYMENT_KIND_NAME, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'BANK' AND DD_KEY = AP.PAYMENT_BANK) PAYMENT_BANK, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'UC_KIND' AND DD_KEY = AP.KIND) KIND_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(AP.PAYMENT_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %T') PAYMENT_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COURSE_REGISTER WHERE APPROVAL_ID = AP.APPROVAL_ID AND COST_ID != 0) COST_ID_CNT FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS = 'A' AND DATE_FORMAT(AP.PAYMENT_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tDate},'%Y%m%d') AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ORDER BY AP.CREATE_DATE DESC ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}

SELECT SUM(DATA.CNT) CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS = 'A' AND DATE_FORMAT(AP.PAYMENT_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tDate},'%Y%m%d') AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ) DATA

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT AP.APPROVAL_ID, AP.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, AP.TOTAL_COST, AP.PAYMENT_POINT, AP.PAYMENT_COST, AP.PAYMENT_KIND, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'PAYMENT_KIND2' AND DD_KEY = AP.PAYMENT_KIND) PAYMENT_KIND_NAME, (SELECT CONCAT(BANK_NAME,' ',ACC_NO) FROM BANK WHERE SEQ = AP.PAYMENT_BANK) PAYMENT_BANK, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'UC_KIND' AND DD_KEY = AP.KIND) KIND_NAME, AP.STATUS FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS IN ('B','C') AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ORDER BY AP.STATUS, AP.CREATE_DATE DESC ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT SUM(DATA.CNT) CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS = 'B' AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ) DATA

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT AP.APPROVAL_ID, AP.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'UC_KIND' AND DD_KEY = AP.KIND) KIND_NAME, AP.TOTAL_COST, AP.PAYMENT_POINT, AP.PAYMENT_COST, AP.REFUND_COST, DATE_FORMAT(AP.REFUND_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %T') REFUND_DATE FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS = 'R' AND DATE_FORMAT(AP.REFUND_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tDate},'%Y%m%d') AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ORDER BY AP.CREATE_DATE DESC ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}

SELECT SUM(DATA.CNT) CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.STATUS = 'R' AND DATE_FORMAT(AP.REFUND_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{fDate},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{tDate},'%Y%m%d') AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') ) DATA

SELECT AP.APPROVAL_ID, AP.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, AP.TOTAL_COST, AP.PAYMENT_POINT, AP.PAYMENT_COST, AP.PAYMENT_KIND, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'BANK' AND DD_KEY = AP.PAYMENT_BANK) PAYMENT_BANK, (SELECT DD_VALUE FROM CODE WHERE DD_MAIN = 'UC_KIND' AND DD_KEY = AP.KIND) KIND_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(AP.PAYMENT_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %T') PAYMENT_DATE, AP.REFUND_COST, AP.REFUND_BANK, AP.REFUND_ACC_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(AP.REFUND_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %T') REFUND_DATE FROM APPROVAL AP LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = AP.USER_ID WHERE AP.APPROVAL_ID = #{approvalId}

SELECT CC.COURSE_NAME, (SELECT KIND FROM APPROVAL WHERE APPROVAL_ID = A.APPROVAL_ID) KIND, SUM(C.COURSE_COST) COURSE_COST, COUNT(*) COMP_USER_CNT FROM COURSE_REGISTER A JOIN COURSE C ON C.COURSE_ID = A.COURSE_ID JOIN COURSE_CODE CC ON CC.COURSE_CODE = C.COURSE_CODE WHERE A.APPROVAL_ID = #{approvalId} GROUP BY CC.COURSE_NAME

UPDATE APPROVAL SET STATUS = 'R', REFUND_COST = #{refundCost}, REFUND_BANK = #{refundBank}, REFUND_ACC_NUM = #{refundAccNum}, REFUND_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser} WHERE APPROVAL_ID = #{approvalId}
